Title: Foursquare for Windows Phone 7
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Foursquare for Windows Phone 7.

THIS IS NOT THE FOURSQUARE APPLICATION AVAILABLE ON WP7 MARKETPLACE. FOR FEEDBACK ON THAT APPLICATION, PLEASE LEAVE A REVIEW IN THE MARKETPLACE.

This app was created by touchality as a quick alpha release of foursquare. They have since created a new, unrelated app and are not working on this code any more. For more info contact touchality on twitter.
http://twitter.com/touchality/
